parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to include hidden rows and columns in the Row and Column indexes, false to not

parameters.name: Equation
parameters.description: Equation to solve; empty string to remove an equation

title: ITableAnnotation.EvaluateCellEquation
description: Solves the specified equation in the specified cell of this BOM table.
signature:

   System.Int32
Row
,
   System.Int32
Column
,
   System.Boolean
IncludeHidden
,
   System.String
Equation
,
   out System.String
SolvedValue
)

parameters.name: IncludeHidden
parameters.description: True to include hidden rows and columns in the Row and Column indexes, false to not

parameters.name: Equation
parameters.description: Equation to solve; empty string to remove an equation

returns: Return code as defined in swCellEquationStatus_e
